Map of Canada

Source: R/cosewic_tools.R
map_canada.Rd

Wrapper around rnaturalearth::ne_countries() to creates a simple features basic map of Canada with CRS 3347 (Statistics Canada Lambert).

map_canada()

Value

Sf data frame

Examples


map_canada()
#> Simple feature collection with 1 feature and 94 fields
#> Geometry type: MULTIPOLYGON
#> Dimension:     XY
#> Bounding box:  xmin: 3681957 ymin: 658540.6 xmax: 9016129 ymax: 5249114
#> Projected CRS: NAD83 / Statistics Canada Lambert
#>        featurecla scalerank labelrank sovereignt sov_a3 adm0_dif level

#>   mapcolor8 mapcolor9 mapcolor13  pop_est pop_rank gdp_md_est pop_year
#> 3         6         2          2 35623680       15    1674000     2017

#> 3       2011     2016 1. Developed region: G7 1. High income: OECD        NA

plot(map_canada())
#> Warning: plotting the first 9 out of 94 attributes; use max.plot = 94 to plot all


library(ggplot2)
ggplot(data = map_canada()) + geom_sf()
